about_the_game:
The Toy Box Weapons Pack includes the following content, for use in Borderlands 3:

  • Toy Guns with unique effects
  • Toy grenade mod
  • Toy weapon trinket

This content is included in the Borderlands 3 Deluxe Edition and Super Deluxe Edition.
